markdownRemark.html: Arrighi mentions in his introduction that he couldn't provide enough manuscript examples to satisfy demand. Perhaps a marketing ploy, but I suspect just as the 20th century produced printed writing manuals by calligraphers to satisfy a desire, so also did 16th century authors.
